entry.title: Starting a new blog
entry.summary:
Hullo,

It's been awhile. I was planning on blogging before, but I never got around to it.

My friend Habbie (http://7bits.nl/blog) was looking for a new blogging engine and because of this and the following discussion I got inspired. (also I started using the same engine, Pelican, it's really neat).

Anyway, I've imported some articles of my older blogs and I'm planning to add some write-ups of things I've done in the upcoming weeks.

Thank you for listening, have a good day.

-- Edwin
